35 #include <object_handling_class.h>
36 
37 int main(int argc, char **argv)
38 {
39 
40  ros::init(argc, argv, "solution_node");
41  ros::NodeHandle nh_p("~");
42 
43  // create an instance of the object_handling class
44  Object_Handling object_handling_class(nh_p);
45 
46  // MoveIt! requirement for non-blocking group.move()
47  ros::AsyncSpinner spinner(1);
48  spinner.start();
49 
50  // Create a ROS subscriber for the input point cloud
51  ros::Subscriber sub_cloud =
52  nh_p.subscribe("/r200/camera/depth_registered/points",
53  1,
54  &PclProcessor::pclCallback,
55  &object_handling_class.pcl_obj_);
56 
57  // loop rate in Hz
58  ros::Rate rate(30);
59 
60  while (ros::ok())
61  {
62 
63  // spin and process all pending callbacks
64  ros::spinOnce();
65 
66  // sleep to fulfill the loop rate
67  rate.sleep();
68  }
69 }

PclProcessor pcl_obj_
PclProcessor object as a member variable.
